title: Public transport for the Australia Day public holiday: Friday 26 January 2024
articleContent:
Public transport for the Australia Day public holiday: Friday 26 January 2024

This year the Australia Day public holiday falls on Friday 26 January 2024.

Most public transport services will operate to a Saturday timetable, but some services may be altered or will not run.

Before you travel

Please plan your journey using Journey planner or view timetables for your specific line or route before you travel.

 Metropolitan train

Services will run to a Saturday timetable.

Night Network services will not run on Friday morning.

Plan your journey using Journey planner or view timetables.

 Metropolitan tram

Trams run to a Saturday timetable.

Night Network services will run to a normal Friday timetable.

Please note:

  • Route 12 trams run a shortened service between St Kilda and Stop 122 Southern Cross Station. Route 12 passengers consider Route 109 trams along Collins Street and Victoria Parade between Stop 1 Southern Cross Station and Victoria Gardens.
  • Free Australian Open shuttle trams run as Route 70a between:
    • Stope D6 Flinders Street West and Stop 7C John Cain Arena, until one hour after the end of play each night.
    • Melbourne Park and Stop 39 Camberwell Tram Depot after end of play each night.

Plan your journey using Journey planner or view timetables.

 Metropolitan bus

Most services will run to a Saturday timetable.

Moonee Valley Bus Lines Routes 503 and 506 will not run.

The following regional services will run on Australia Day to various timetables. All other regional bus services will not run.

  • Inverloch-Wonthaggi-Traralgon (weekend timetable)
  • Coronet Bay Corinella Grantville (Sunday timetable)
  • Wonthaggi – Traralgon/Inverloch & Cowes to Wonthaggi via Anderson & Ventnor (weekend timetable)
  • Warragul Town Service and Garfield to Traralgon (Saturday timetable)
  • Yarram – Traralgon (Sunday timetable)
  • Paynesville – Bairnsdale (Saturday timetable)
  • Loch Sport (M-F timetable)
  • Omeo – Bright (M-W-F timetable)
  • Mallacoota – Genoa (M-Th-F timetable)
  • La Trobe Valley Transit service (Saturday timetable) – No routes 6 & 7
  • Kilmore Town Service (Saturday timetable)
  • Wallan Town Service (Saturday timetable)
  • (Christians) Bendigo Transit Service (Saturday timetable) – No route 63 and 64
  • Mildura Transit Service (Sunday timetable)
  • Heathcote – Bendigo (Saturday timetable)
  • Strathfieldsaye – Bendigo Route (Saturday timetable)
  • (McHarry’s) Geelong & Bellarine Transit (Saturday timetable) – No route 40
  • (CDC) Geelong Transit Service (Saturday timetable)
  • Warrnambool Town (Saturday timetable)
  • Portland Town School Service (Saturday timetable)
  • Colac – Lorne Summer Service (Saturday timetable)
  • Colac – Apollo Bay Summer Service (Saturday timetable)
  • (CDC) Ballarat Transit Service (Saturday timetable)
  • (Christians) Bacchus Marsh Town School Service (Saturday timetable)

Please plan your journey using Journey planner or view timetables for your specific route.

Night Network services will not run.

 Regional trains and coaches

On Australia Day, V/Line train and coach services will operate to a Saturday timetable with the following alterations.

Night Coaches will operate to a normal Saturday timetable.

The Overland – Melbourne – Adelaide

The Overland service from Adelaide to Melbourne will operate as per Friday schedule.

Canberra – Bairnsdale

Coach service from Canberra to Bairnsdale will operate as school holidays Sunday timetable.

The Bairnsdale to Canberra service will not run.

Geelong/Apollo Bay

  • Apollo Bay Summer additional services will operate to a Saturday timetable.

Melbourne – Mildura

  • The 9:10pm Melbourne to Mildura service will operate to a normal Friday timetable.
  • The 10:05pm Mildura to Melbourne service will operate to a normal Friday timetable

Wangaratta - Mount Beauty

  • The 4:45pm Melbourne to Mount Beauty service will operate to a Friday timetable with taxis from Bright to Mount Beauty.
  • The 10:55am Mount Beauty to Melbourne service will operate to a Friday timetable with taxis from Mount Beauty to Bright.

Melbourne – Mallacoota

  • The 7:54am Melbourne to Mallacoota service will operate to a school holidays Sunday timetable.
  • The 11:55am Mallacoota to Melbourne service will operate to a school holidays Sunday timetable.

Narooma – Mallacoota

  • The 9:50am Narooma to Mallacoota service will operate to a school holidays Sunday timetable.
  • The 2:35pm Mallacoota to Narooma service will operate to a school holidays Sunday timetable.

Please plan your journey using Journey planner or view timetables for your specific route.
